Desc.entry:
A registered charity providing supported accommodation at St Elizabeth Close and Leighton View for people with mild to moderate learning disabilities. Helps people in their own homes to increase independence or maintain current abilities. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
Offers advice and support to people who receive direct payments and helps individuals to manage their care budget. Self or any referral.
